source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_SEQ_00<tab>Yugiri's somber expression suggests you have arrived right on time.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_SEQ_00<tab>ドマ町人地のユウギリは、どこかしめやかな様子だ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_SEQ_01<tab>Preparations for the funeral are complete. The blasphemy continues to remain out of sight, and so Hien wishes to seize this opportunity to carry out the ceremony. Gosetsu, unfortunately, will be unable to attend, but Hien hopes you will accompany him and Yugiri as they make their way to the Swallow's Compass.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_SEQ_01<tab>ドマの国葬が執り行われるので、冒険者も参列することになった。ヤンサのガンエン廟前にいる「ヒエン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_SEQ_02<tab>While waiting for villagers to arrive, Hien is approached by Kisei, who comes not to argue but to apologize─or so it would seem. Hoping to catch him off guard, Kisei unsheathes a dagger and makes to strike, only to be cut down by Yugiri. But the seemingly foolish endeavor is in service to a greater plan, as Kisei's death draws the blasphemy from hiding, intent upon avenging its stepmother. A fierce battle ensues, and as the situation turns dire, Gosetsu joins the fray not with sword in hand but with a cane, wielding healing magicks of surprising potency. With his aid, the blasphemy is at last laid low, and the funeral can be held without fear of further disruption.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_SEQ_02<tab>ヒエンと話し、ガンエン廟で参列者を待っていたところ、キセイが現れた。彼女はヒエンに襲い掛かったが、ユウギリに斬り捨てられた。そこに偽神獣が現れて襲ってきたが、ゴウセツも駆けつけ皆で討伐を果たした。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_SEQ_03<tab>The villagers of Doma are at last gathered, and Hien conducts a heartfelt service in remembrance of those poor souls who were never returned to Doma. One by one he recites the names and stories of parents, siblings, and children, until he finally speaks of Minato and Kisei─not of their tragic end, but of the happiness and fulfillment they found in family. The ceremony ends with a moment of silence, all present bowing their heads in prayer for their loved ones.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_SEQ_03<tab>ガンエン廟にてドマの国葬が執り行われた。納められた者たちの逸話が語られ、参列したドマの民は皆、涙していた。ガンエン廟前の「ヒエン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_SEQ_04<tab>With the blasphemy slain and the funeral complete, there is naught left to do but return home. And so, Hien, Yugiri, and Gosetsu are off to the Doman Enclave.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_SEQ_04<tab>ヒエンと話した。ドマ町人地に戻り「ヒエン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_SEQ_05<tab>Though it may be years, if not decades, until the people of Doma truly make peace with their past, Hien believes they have turned a corner. Yugiri praises Gosetsu's skill with healing magicks, prompting him to stress that he is still but a novice. It is for that reason that, unfortunately, he must once more leave on pilgrimage to hone his skills─though he reassures a disappointed Hien that he will fly to his side should the need arise. And so the former samurai takes his leave, prompting you to make ready to return to your other affairs as well. Hien thanks you once more for your aid, and bids you relay word of the blasphemy's demise to their representative at Radz-at-Han.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_SEQ_05<tab>ヒエンと話した。ゴウセツは慰霊の旅に戻っていった。ヒエンは民が亡くした大切な人を葬送したことで、やっと、皆が未来を見据えることができると語った。偽神獣の討伐を報告するため、ラザハンの流星の間にいる「ドマの駐在武官」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_SEQ_06<tab>The Doman delegate is overjoyed to learn that the blasphemy is no more, and that the state of affairs in Doma is much improved for your involvement. If Hien should have need of your marksmanship again, he is certain to seek you out before all others.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_SEQ_06<tab>ドマの駐在武官に偽神獣討伐を報告した。過去に向き合い別れを果たしたことで、ドマはこれから新たな道を歩み始めるだろう。

target: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_TODO_00<tab>ガンエン廟前のヒエンと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_YUGIRI_000_000<tab>As ever, your timing is impeccable. We but moments ago completed preparations for the funeral.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_YUGIRI_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿。
ガンエン廟に安置する遺品のすべてが集まり、
いよいよ国葬が執り行われる運びとなった。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_YUGIRI_000_001<tab>I will inform Lord Hien of your arrival.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_YUGIRI_000_001<tab>それでは、ヒエン様をお呼びしよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_002<tab>You're here. Excellent. The blasphemy continues to shun our settlements, and I mean to make the most of the time its absence affords us.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_002<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、来てくれたか。
相も変わらず、偽神獣の行方は掴めておらぬのだが、
これは国葬を執り行う好機とも言える。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_003<tab>I assume you were planning to take part in the ceremony?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_003<tab>獣へと至る絶望を打ち払うため、
ひとりでも多くの遺族に「過去」と向き合う機会を作りたいのだ。
ぜひ、解放の英雄たるそなたにも、参列してもらいたい。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_004<tab>Glad to hear it. Unfortunately, Gosetsu will not be joining us today.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_004<tab>そうそう参列と言えばだな……
残念ながら、ゴウセツは不参加となった。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_005<tab>He's injured himself, as I knew he would with his secret training, and now grumbles from the confines of his bed. But he will be fine in due course. We may worry over his convalescence <var 1A 02 /var>after<var 1A 01 /var> the funeral.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_005<tab>あやつめ、やはり隠れて剣の修行をしておったようでな。
無理がたたって腰を痛め、寝込んでしまいよったのだ。
そんなわけで、我らだけでガンエン廟に向かうぞ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_YUGIRI_000_010<tab>There was a peculiar-looking doll among the effects, but I can find no record of it in our stores. Would you happen to know who brought it?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_YUGIRI_000_010<tab>ガンエン廟に安置する遺品の中に、
「セイテンタイセイ」の人形があったのだが、
あれはいったい……？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_020<tab>The villagers should arrive ere long. Then we may begin.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_020<tab>参列者が集まるまで、まだ時間がある。
中で待つことにしよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_KISEI_000_101<tab>Lord Hien. I...
target: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_KISEI_000_101<tab>ヒ、ヒエン様……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_KISEI_000_102<tab>I apologize, my lord, for my past transgressions.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_KISEI_000_102<tab>まことに申し訳ございませんでした……！
これまでの御無礼の数々、どうか、どうかご容赦くださいませぇ！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_KISEI_000_103<tab>I yearned to believe my daughter was a kami reborn, but you were right─she is a monster. Words can ill express my shame for advocating the conscripts be sacrificed to appease the dead.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_KISEI_000_103<tab>義娘が転化いたしましたのは、イザナミ様に非ず……！
ヒエン様の御触れにあったとおり、偽神獣でございました！
帰還者に対する非道なる言動も、謹んでお詫び申し上げます！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_KISEI_000_104<tab>Nay, this ceremony shall serve far, far better... And so, as a humble citizen of Doma, I offer my deepest gratitude...and beg for your forgiveness.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_KISEI_000_104<tab>ヒエン様が国葬を執り行うと聞きおよび、
ドマの民のひとりとして、感激した次第にございます……！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_KISEI_000_105<tab>I would make an offering on behalf of my husband and son, as well as my dear stepdaughter, Minato. I throw myself on your mercy, Lord Hien─allow them a place within the mausoleum, that their spirits may know peace.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_KISEI_000_105<tab>まっこと勝手ながら、我が夫と息子……
さらに偽神獣に転じた義娘の遺品も持参いたしました。
どうか、どうか共に安置し、供養していただきたく存じます！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_106<tab>There is no need to beg forgiveness, Kisei. Please, rise.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_106<tab>もちろんだとも。
さあ、面をあげてくれ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_KISEI_000_107<tab>She will come...for you...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_KISEI_000_107<tab>これで……義娘が……
仇を……討ってくれる……はず……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_108<tab>By the kami! She gave her life to draw out the blasphemy!?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_108<tab>己が命を餌に、偽神獣を呼び寄せたか……！
来るぞ……！！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_130<tab>
target: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_130<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_GOSETSU_000_131<tab>(-???-)Apologies for the untimely arrival, my lord.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_GOSETSU_000_131<tab>(-？？？？-)遅くなり申したが、拙者も助太刀いたしますぞ！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_132<tab>Gosetsu? What is that staff?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_132<tab>ゴウセツ？
そ、その錫杖は……？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_GOSETSU_000_133<tab>Pilgrimage proved a most enlightening experience, and is where I chanced to discover the benefits of ascetic training. I may no longer be fit to wield a blade, my lord, but shugendo affords me another way to turn the tide of battle.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_GOSETSU_000_133<tab>実は慰霊の旅の道すがら、修験道の鍛錬を始めましてな。
もはや刀は持てませんが、少しはお役に立ってみせましょうぞ！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_134<tab>Stubborn as ever... I shall have to thank you later.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_134<tab>まっこと、しぶとい男だのう……。
しかし、おかげで助かった。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_135<tab>Let us put an end to this!
target: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_135<tab>では、仕切り直しといこう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_111<tab>A deceiver to the bitter end. But she is still a daughter of Doma. She will have a proper burial, and her family's belongings enshrined with the others.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_111<tab>救うことはできなかったが、
せめて、彼女の亡骸と、家族の遺品も安置してやろう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_112<tab>I have gathered you here today not to speak of the future, but to reflect on the past. To pay respects to loved ones fallen on the field of battle.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_112<tab>此度は未来を語るのではなく、過去に目を向けたい。
戦場で死んでいった者たちには、
それぞれの人生があり、思い出があった。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_113<tab>In honor of their sacrifices, these sons and daughters of Doma shall be given a place here, at the Swallow's Compass.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_113<tab>長くなるが、ガンエン廟に埋葬される、
すべての者たちの名と、その逸話を聞いてもらいたい。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_114<tab>Though they no longer walk with us in life, they walk with us in spirit. Pray never forget their bravery, that the memories of their legacy give you comfort and strength.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_114<tab>そうして、皆に知ってもらうことで、
故人は我らの記憶の中で生き続けることができる。
それこそ最大の供養と、遺族への慰めになるだろう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_115<tab>Maroya Motokawa, the aspiring painter. He was a man who saw beauty in all things, and one day would have become a renowned artist in Kugane.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_115<tab>モトカワのマロヤ。
水墨画を嗜み、ことさらヤンサの山並みを好んで描きたり。
クガネにて画家を生業とすることを夢見て精進す。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_116<tab>Motosue Jito, the warrior-in-training. He longed to become a samurai like his father, and bring honor to his family.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_116<tab>ジトウのモトスエ。
我が父、カイエンに仕える侍衆のひとりなり。
家族のため犠牲となった、その功は父の誉れとならん。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_117<tab>Suzushiro Kodakumi, the carpenter. A man wholly dedicated to his craft, who hoped to one day pass on his talents to his two loving children.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_117<tab>コダクミのスズシロ。
ノミと槌あれば、いかなる木材も万物に変える職人なり。
仕事一筋の一本気、長男との晩酌のみを愉しみとする。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_118<tab>And lastly, Minato Shihogaki, and her stepmother Kisei. Theirs was once a happiness to be envied.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_118<tab>最後に……シホガキのミナト。
そして、彼女の義母であったキセイについても語りたい。
ふたりにも、たしかに幸せな暮らしがあったことを……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_119<tab>Minato's parents were murdered by imperial soldiers, and after being rescued by the Confederacy, Minato was given into the care of the village of Isari. Though she arrived with a broken heart, it was soon mended by the man who would become her husband. The son of Kisei, who herself had been borne to Isari on winds of tragedy.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_119<tab>ミナトの両親は、帝国兵に殺められたが、
海賊衆の助けにより、イサリ村で暮らすこととなった。
そこで、愛する夫を得て、心安らぐ居場所を見つけたという。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_120<tab>Kisei was a child of the deep, born in Sui<var 1F /var>no<var 1F /var>Sato. For her gifts she was exiled, but with her courage and tenacity found a new home on the shores of the Ruby Sea. She was a devoted wife and mother, and though not related by blood, she loved Minato as if she were their own.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_120<tab>キセイは、スイの里に生まれし海の民なり。
追放の憂き目にあったがイサリ村で家庭を築き、一男をもうけた。
義娘となったミナトともども、仲睦まじき家族であったという。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_121<tab>That is how she lived─how they all lived─and how they should be remembered. Let your hearts swell not with sorrow, but with joy for their memory. Know that proof of their mark left on this world shall remain here, enshrined within the Swallow's Compass for all eternity.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_121<tab>本日、納められた者は以上である。
彼らの生は、我らの心とともに……
彼らが生きた証は、我らが廟にて永久に祀らん……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_122<tab>Let us still our voices, and in silence pray for their souls. That they may share in the peace we have found.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_122<tab>皆で故人に黙祷を捧げよう。
我らはいま、平和を掴んだのだと伝えるために……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_YUGIRI_000_140<tab>Many tears were shed throughout the ceremony. Not for grief, but for relief, I think. Happiness, even.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_YUGIRI_000_140<tab>参列者は皆、涙を流していた。
ついに故人との別れを果たしたのだな。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_GOSETSU_000_141<tab>Traditionally the royal mausoleum is reserved for the ruling clans, but I have no doubt Lord Kaien would approve of his son's decision.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_GOSETSU_000_141<tab>ガンエン廟に民の遺品が収められたこと。
きっと、カイエン様もご賛同くださるだろう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_150<tab>Well, I certainly wasn't expecting battle with a blasphemy as a prelude to the ceremony. At least now we may breathe easy, if only for a short while.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_150<tab>偽神獣との戦いになろうとは予想外であったが、
これで、すべて終わったのだな……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_151<tab>The villagers have all returned home, and I believe it is time we did the same.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_151<tab>皆、大儀であった。
さあ、ドマ町人地に戻るとしよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_YUGIRI_000_160<tab>Never in my wildest dreams did I foresee Gosetsu embracing the ascetic arts.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_YUGIRI_000_160<tab>ゴウセツには何度も驚かされてきたが、
今回が一番かもしれぬ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_GOSETSU_000_161<tab>I am not yet well versed in healing magicks, but thankfully it was enough to be of some use to Lord Hien.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_GOSETSU_000_161<tab>癒し手はまだ慣れぬが、役に立てたでござろうか？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_170<tab>We've held a national funeral and slain a blasphemy besides. A rather productive day, would you not agree?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_170<tab>偽神獣を討伐し、国葬を以て、さらなる獣化への対策も打てた。
これにて、一件落着と言ってもよかろう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_100_170<tab>The former conscripts will be elated to finally return home.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_100_170<tab>帰燕館に匿っていた帰還者たちも開放し、
もとの生活に戻ってもらおう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_171<tab>Speaking of returns, I think I speak for us all when I say your appearance at Swallow's Compass came as something of a shock. What of your injuries from training?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_171<tab>それにしても、ゴウセツ。
そなたの登場には驚いたぞ。
刀の稽古で腰を痛めたのではなかったのか？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_GOSETSU_000_172<tab>Quite painful for some time, I assure you. Despite my best efforts to reclaim my former skills, my back and my hips vigorously protested.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_GOSETSU_000_172<tab>それは本当でござる。
できれば、侍として助太刀できればと願っていたものの、
腰が言うことを聞きませなんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_GOSETSU_000_173<tab>I planned to sleep that I might be well rested for the morrow's hunt, but a voice called out to me. I was needed, and so I grabbed my cane and ran as quickly as my ailing body would allow.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_GOSETSU_000_173<tab>寝込んでいたところに、誰かに呼ばれた気がしましてな。
気合で起き上がり、錫杖を掴んで馳せ参じた次第でござる。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_YUGIRI_000_174<tab>The cane suits you, Gosetsu, but your mastery of healing magicks was a sight to behold. Almost as surprising as your resurrection following the fall of Doma Castle.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_YUGIRI_000_174<tab>まさか、あのゴウセツが癒し手に転身とはな。
ドマ城から生還したときよりも驚かされた。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_GOSETSU_000_175<tab>I am still but a novice in dire need of training. 'Tis my hope that I will be able to refine my ascetic arts during my next pilgrimage.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_GOSETSU_000_175<tab>とはいっても、まだまだ修行の身。
これより再び慰霊の旅に出て、鍛錬に励むつもりでござる。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_176<tab>So you are leaving, then?
target: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_176<tab>そうか、また行ってしまうのだな……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_GOSETSU_000_177<tab>Worry not, Lord Hien. Should you find yourself in dire straits once more, I shall fly to your side. Not as a samurai, perhaps, but I will nonetheless give our enemies cause to tremble.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_GOSETSU_000_177<tab>ヒエン様が困ったときには、いつでも戻って参りましょう。
このゴウセツ、侍改め修験者として生涯現役で戦う所存。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_GOSETSU_000_178<tab>And with that, I take my leave!
target: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_GOSETSU_000_178<tab>では、これにて御免……！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_179<tab>Though it may be years, if not decades, until we truly make peace with our past, we have turned a corner and begun to heal. We may look to the future unburdened by grief ignored and sadness denied. The path ahead is ever fraught with peril, but we shall walk it with eyes unclouded...and with pride.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_179<tab>さて、国葬にて民は過去と向き会い、故人に別れを告げた。
これでやっと、皆が未来を見据えることができるだろう。
ドマはこれから新たな道を歩み始めるのだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_180<tab>You have done so much for us, for Doma. I wish there was more I could do for you.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_180<tab>そなたには、まっこと世話になった。
ドマのために尽力してくれたこと、心より感謝する。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_181<tab>If I may ask one last favor, before you leave, please inform our representative at Radz-at-Han that the blasphemy has been vanquished, and the people of Doma are safe. With any luck, our experiences here will prove useful to other nations that yet grapple with these beasts.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_181<tab>最後に手数をかけさせてすまぬが、偽神獣を討伐した旨、
ラザハンにいるドマの駐在武官まで報告を頼みたい。
この経験が、他国の対策の助けとなるようにな。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_190<tab>Safe travels, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and may the kami bless you.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_HIEN_000_190<tab>ドマのために尽力してくれたこと、心より感謝する。
手数をかけさせてすまぬが、偽神獣を討伐した旨、
ラザハンにいるドマの駐在武官まで報告を頼みたい。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_YUGIRI_000_191<tab>The people of Sui-no-Sato will be relieved to hear of recent events. I wonder what Mother and Father would say...?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_YUGIRI_000_191<tab>スイの里にもこの朗報を届けよう。
きっと、母様、父様も喜んでくださる。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_200<tab><var 08 E905 ((Lady)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you are returned! What word from Doma?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_200<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、戻られましたか。
して、首尾はいかがでしょう？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_201<tab>The blasphemy is no more!? That is most wonderful news! I must inform the other delegates at once.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_201<tab>ヒエン様ともども、偽神獣の討伐に成功されたと！
それはとても喜ばしい報せ、すぐさま各国に共有いたします。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_202<tab>Thank you again for answering our summons. If another threat should rear its dastardly head, I pray we can count on your assistance again.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_202<tab>此度は要請に応じてわが故郷を救っていただき、
誠にありがとうございました！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_SYSTEM_100_205<tab>You can now dye the job-specific gear for level 90 physical ranged DPS.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_SYSTEM_100_205<tab>遠隔物理DPSジョブ向け「レベル90ジョブ専用装備」の、
染色が可能になりました。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_SYSTEM_100_206<tab>Job-specific gear will become available once you have fulfilled certain conditions within the main scenario quests for Endwalker.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA451_04125_SYSTEM_100_206<tab>「レベル90ジョブ専用装備」は、
「メインクエスト：暁月のフィナーレ」を、
特定の状態まで完了することで、入手できるようになります。
